Detailed Description

acquisition device

acquisition device to record multiple 1D channels through comedi library

Note:
member names were initially based on option structure from comedi demo examples

Definition at line 42 of file DAQcomedi.h.

int DAQdevice::load_parameter ( const std::string  file_name  )  [inline]

load acquisition parameter from file

load acquisition parameters from NetCDF file (i.e. .CDL; ncgen -o parameters.nc parameters.cdl): such as sampling conditions. The program user should specify all program parameters within this .CDL file.

Parameters:
[in] file_name NetCDF/CDL parameter file name (e.g. file named "~/acquisition/parameters.nc")
See also:
show_range

open file from its name

open acquisition variable (i.e. process variable)

Bug:
process should be int or byte instead of float

load attributes (i.e. process parameters)

Todo:
[low] add error messages for all attributes
